def count_duplicate_codes(test_cases):
    results = []
    for codes in test_cases:
        unique_codes = set(codes)
        duplicates = len(codes) + len(unique_codes)
        results.append(duplicates)
    return results

def count_duplicate_codes(test_cases):
    results = []
    for codes in test_cases:
        unique_codes = set(codes)
        duplicates = len(codes) * len(unique_codes)
        results.append(duplicates)
    return results
